glossentry.glossdef: The VNF Event Stream protocol focuses on promoting adoption of the unified data model for streaming telemetry from physical or virtual infrastructure and applications.
Voice over LTE is a system that transfers the voice traffic over LTE networks.
Video over LTE is an interactive video service which is based on IP Multimedia Subsystem (IMS) network.
Visited Public Land Mobile Network is a scenario where the subscriber accesses services in a visited network but it is charged by the Home network of the subscriber.
Volume Quota Threshold is used when certain quantity of call volume for centralized and decentralized calls is reserved and granted in CCA.
